movies.title: Inception
movies.desc: A skilled thief who steals secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given a chance to have his criminal record erased if he can successfully perform an inception.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.desc: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.desc: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage done by Thanos and save the universe in this epic conclusion to the Marvel Cinematic Universe's Infinity Saga.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his evil uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life story.
